SRQ Am Series 2019 Registration

Get registered here! Make sure to print out and sign the waiver!

Exceptional people can even send their completed waivers to srqam@coastline941.com and will help make the world a better place let us get back to the skatepark faster.

Skate

We're looking for up to 12 riders in each of 3 categories.

  • 2 Runs Each
  • 45 Seconds Per Run

Each session will be judged by our most excellent panel of judgy folks.

Skate Registration

BMX

For BMX we're also looking for up to 12 riders in each of 3 categories.

  • 2 Runs Each
  • 45 Seconds Per Run

Each session will be judged by our most excellent panel of judgy folks.

BMX Registration
